text: I would never use a publishing tool that required me to use their editor to publish. Because, as a writer for many years, I already ahve a great writing environment that's perfectly tuned for me, or (more likely) I've learned to ignore its flaws. It's very forgiving of my foibles. Your editor doesn't know me at all. And btw, I might want to publish this stuff somewhere else at some time, which is probably the real reason they don't let you choose your editor.
